_header: Wheresoever ye fare by frith or by fell
_description: Dame Juliana Berner’s Book of Hunting

Lam491.First Lines:
My dere sone wher so ȝe fare by firth or by fellTakith good
                    heed how Trystram wold tell…
Lam491.Last Lines:
…Al togidir schal be take and leyd on þe s[kyn]And
                    ȝef it ȝowr houndis and þat scalled y[wis]…
